text: Adobe Acrobat is a family of software made by Adobe Systems. Software in the family can read and display Portable Document Format (PDF) files. Acrobat software can convert PDFs to other formats, PDF to Microsoft Word or Excel for example. It can also combine multiple file types into a single PDF file. Acrobat can be used as a standalone app on desktop and mobile, or in a browser. ==References== Category:Adobe software
title: Adobe Acrobat
